ca.mcgill.ecse211.Project.Localization

Class UltrasonicLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.Project.Localization.UltrasonicLocalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UltrasonicLocalization
extends java.lang.Thread
    In this class, we have our ultrasonic localization routine. We are using rising edge to orient the robot correctly. Afterwards, the light localization routine can be performed
    Author:
    Pearl Wu
